title: Development and evaluation of a Lateral flow immunoassay (LFIA) prototype for the detection of IgG anti-SARS-CoV-2 antibodies
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Matheus Bernardes Torres Fogaça, Djairo Pastor Saavedra, Leonardo Lopes-Luz, Bergmann Morais Ribeiro, Luciano da Silva Pinto, Tatsuya Nagata, Fabricio Rochedo Conceição, Mariane Martins de Araújo Stefani, Samira Buhrer-Sékula
